alert.note: Alert for Clark; Floyd; Harrison; Orange; Scott; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 2:45PM EST until March 03 at 3:15PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Harrison County in south central Indiana... Clark County in south central Indiana... Floyd County in south central Indiana... Scott County in south central Indiana... Northeastern Orange County in south central Indiana... Washington County in south central Indiana... Northwestern Jefferson County in central Kentucky... * Until 315 PM EST. * At 245 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Bedford to 8 miles west of Valley Station, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters and weather observing stations. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Shively around 255 PM EST. Louisville, Jeffersonville and New Albany around 300 PM EST. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Floyd; Harrison; Orange; Scott; Washington
